description: name of the person who ran the experiment (string)
date of the experiment (string in ISO 8601 format)
instrument id used for the experiment (string)
description of method used to determine amount adsorbed, eg. volumetric (string)
description of isotherm type, eg. absolute, excess, net (string)
saturation pressure of the experiment at the temperature of the experiment (float)
name of the person who digitized the experiment (string)
unique identifying code used by the operator (string)
date of the simulation (string in ISO 8601 format)
num of unit cells, sample mass, etc (string)
the digital object identifier (DOI) of the cited work (string)
equilibrium pressure of the adsorption measurement (float)
saturation pressure of the adsorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment(float)
amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)
equilibrium  pressure of the desorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment (float)
saturation pressure of the desorption measurement at the temperature of the experiment (float)
amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)
excess amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)
absolute amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)
net amount adsorbed during the adsorption measurement (float)
excess amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)
absolute amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)
net amount adsorbed during the desorption measurement (float)
version of AIF data names (Github commit hash)
